name: draw_turtle
description: Draw a path using turtle-style commands with a heading, forward movement, and pen control.

canvas_id.description: Canvas where the turtle path will be rendered.

commands.description: Flat list of turtle-style commands as strings or directional actions.

items.description: Each command string follows 'command value' or 'command' (e.g., 'forward 100', 'left 90', 'penup').

start_x.description: Starting X coordinate of the turtle.

start_y.description: Starting Y coordinate of the turtle.

start_heading.description: Initial turtle heading in degrees (0 = right, 90 = up).

pen_color.description: Initial drawing color as a hex code.
